GeForce GTX 960M : cuda capability 5.0

Gives the same error

RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (8) : invalid device function at c:\anaconda2\conda-bld\pytorch_1519496000060\work\torch\lib\thc\generic/THCTensorMathPointwise.cu:301

x = torch.rand(13, 13).cuda()
y = torch.rand(13,13).cuda()
print(x+y)

body:
GeForce GTX 960M : cuda capability 5.0

Gives the same error

`RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (8) : invalid device function at c:\anaconda2\conda-bld\pytorch_1519496000060\work\torch\lib\thc\generic/THCTensorMathPointwise.cu:301`

for 

`x = torch.rand(13, 13).cuda()`
`y = torch.rand(13,13).cuda()`
`print(x+y)`
